answerText: The Divine Comedy [or La Divina Commedia][10] Much like the three sections of Sergio de la Pava's novel A Naked Singularity, the three sections of The Divine Comedy all end with this plural word.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 3 | 18 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The first known use of terzarima was in this work. For 10 points each: [10] Name this three-part poem which chronicles Dante's spiritual journey through Hell, Purgatory, and Paradise.
